spec_data.Name: anki
spec_data.License: AGPLv3+ and GPLv3+ and MIT and BSD
spec_data.Description:
Anki is a program designed to help you remember facts (such as words
and phrases in a foreign language) as easily, quickly and efficiently
as possible. Anki is based on a theory called spaced repetition.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:31:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Flashcard program for using space repetition learning
